scripts.build:post: npm run minifyjs && npm run keepminonly
scripts.minifyjs: terser dist/scripts/*.js -o dist/scripts/script.min.js -c -m && javascript-obfuscator dist/scripts/script.min.js --output dist/scripts/script.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --self-defending true --disable-console-output true
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run unit:test && npm run e2e:test
